alert.note: Alert for Sangamon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 9:23PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN SANGAMON COUNTY THROUGH 945 PM CDT... At 923 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Loami, or 11 miles southwest of Springfield, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Chatham, Auburn, Rochester, Pawnee, New Berlin, Divernon, Loami, Jerome, Southern View, Curran, Berlin, and Glenarm. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 77 and 94. Interstate 72 between mile markers 83 and 100. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
